original_text: His whole army is coming to attack me! They build a road so that they can reach me. They are all around me. His whole army is coming to attack me!
korean_text: 그 군대가 일제히 나아와서 길을 돋우고 나를 치며 내 장막을 둘러 진을 쳤구나

sentences.original_text: His whole army is coming to attack me!
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 온 군대가 나를 공격하러 오고 있다!

sentences.original_text: so that they can reach me.
His whole army is coming to attack me!
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 온 군대가 나를 공격하러 오고 있다!
